Name: Aquaponics Aquarium
Description: An Aquarium with inlets and outlets designed to work in Aquaponics systems. Houses multiple fish whose waste can subsequently be refined into fertilizers.

DescriptionLocalization.zh: 带有进水口和出水口的养鱼池馆，可在生态循环系统中工作。能饲养多条鱼，这些鱼的废物随后可以精炼成肥料。
